attributes.action: Pay Winter Fuel allowance to non domiciled British Pensioners who attain the age of 60 after leaving the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is unfair to discriminate against non domiciled pensioners who were aged 60 after leaving the UK to live in Europe. If you pay those who were 60 and then choose to leave the UK for Europe you should pay everyone over 60. It gets cold in Europe too.

rejection.details:
There are several petitions already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/govpentax/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
